title: Textile, 1930–33
dimensions:
warp: 51cm (20 1/4") weft, selv. on right: 52cm (20 1/2")
Pattern: Technical & visual repeat unit: height: 40.5cm (16")                                                       width: 31.5cm (12 3/8")                    Repeat unit vertically offset 50/50.                                       Pattern printed beyond right selv., only one third actually printed.
description: Thin branching tree in primary colors between fine red stripes on un-dyed background. 4 colors: red, yellow, blue, green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1930–33.
1930–33. printed
Technique: plain weave. Gift of Teresa Kilham. 1958-88-5.
